data.introduce:
国内BOP自动变更出票服务(AirBOPReissue)为用户提供了集运价校验，运价存储，EI存储，FP存储，出票，票面显示等多功能为一体的自动出票服务。
   对应主机指令TRR、ETDZ等指令。
data.business:
国内运价计算、存储、德付通支付、出票。
支持无运价PNR运价计算存储出票操作和含有运价的PNR价格校验和自动出票操作。
data.functions:
支持包含多种旅客类型（成人，包含伤残军人，因公带伤警察）或者儿童（不包含无人陪伴的儿童），婴儿， 暂不其他类型旅客）的PNR出票。比如PNR中包含2名旅客，可以全部为成人，或者全部儿童，或者1名成人，1名儿童；
支持PNR中的全部旅客出票。
支持出票航段状态校验。可以限制只有RR、HK、DK、TK、KL、KK状态的航段才允许出票。婴儿SSR状态仅支持KK 或者HK 出票。
支持用户输入EI信息。如果PNR中没有EI，则将用户输入的EI写入PNR；如果PNR中有EI，则忽略用户输入的EI。
支持大客户编码。
暂不支持一个成人携带2个及2个以上婴儿出票
暂不支持航段数变化的退改出票
暂不支持带地面运输段的退改出票
暂不支持OPEN票的退改出票
暂不支持非CASH支付
暂不支持非自愿变更出票
暂不支持需要付费的原票改期
data.requestSchema: [{"name":"OTA_AirBOPReIssueRQ","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航空出票请求信息","children":[{"name":"POS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"零售商信息：？出票Office号和打票机号","children":[{"name":"Source","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"请求者信息","children":[{"name":"@PseudoCityCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"？出票Office号","children":[]},{"name":"@OtherID","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"打票机号","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"DemandTicketDetail","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"客票信息","children":[{"name":"AirItinerary","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"行程信息集合","children":[{"name":"OriginDestinationOptions","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"出发到达地 信息集合","children":[{"name":"OriginDestinationOption","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"出发到达 信息：出发到达信息项，必输项，最少1个","children":[{"name":"FlightSegment","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"航段信息：航段信息，往返或多段可 设置多个FlightSegment","children":[{"name":"OperatingAirline","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"承运方航空公司：预留","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航空公司两字码：市场方航空公司两字码","children":[]},{"name":"@FlightNumber","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航班号：承运方航班号","children":[]}]},{"name":"DepartureAirport","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"出发地信息","children":[{"name":"@LocationCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"到达地三字码：例如：SHA","children":[]}]},{"name":"ArrivalAirport","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"到达地信息","children":[{"name":"@LocationCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"机场代码（例如：SHA）","children":[]}]},{"name":"MarketingAirline","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"市场方航空公司","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航空公司代码（例如：CA）","children":[]}]},{"name":"BookingClassAvail","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"舱位信息","children":[{"name":"@ResBookDesigCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"舱位代码：预订的舱位代码，仅支持1位或2位字母形式的舱位值，例如Y，KA。不支持M1这样的子舱位，如需预订子舱位需按大舱位进行预订","children":[]}]},{"name":"@RPH","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航段编号：与旅客、ssr等信息关联，多航段时，编号请勿重复。","children":[]},{"name":"@DepartureDateTime","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"出发日期和时间：格式如：2013-05-29T09:00:00","children":[]},{"name":"@FlightNumber","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"市场方航班号：格式如：1831","children":[]},{"name":"@NumberInParty","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航段预订旅客数：预留","children":[]},{"name":"@Status","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"行动代码：即航段状态","children":[]},{"name":"@SegmentType","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航段类别：NORMAL-普通航段 OPEN-不定期航段 ARRIVAL_UNKOWN_ARNK信息航段 一般只写NORMAL","children":[]}]},{"name":"@RPH","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"标识","children":[]}]}]}]},{"name":"BookingReferenceID","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"PNR信息","children":[{"name":"CompanyName","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"大客户编码","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"大客户编码","children":[]}]},{"name":"@ID","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"PNR","children":[]},{"name":"@ID_Context","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"ID标识：PNR:ID是PNR号；","children":[]}]},{"name":"PaymentInfo","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"支付信息","children":[{"name":"@Amount","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"支付金额","children":[]},{"name":"@PaymentType","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"支付类型","children":[]},{"name":"@CardType","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"类型","children":[]},{"name":"@CardCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"信用卡代码","children":[]},{"name":"@CardNumber","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"卡号","children":[]},{"name":"@SeriesCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"验证码","children":[]},{"name":"@ExpireDate","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"到期日期：格式：MMyy","children":[]},{"name":"@Info","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"签注信息","children":[]}]},{"name":"FlightReference","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"航段引用","children":[{"name":"@FlightRefNumber","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航段引用标识","children":[]}]},{"name":"ReIssueInfos","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"运价信息","children":[{"name":"ReIssueInfo","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"退改签明细","children":[{"name":"ReIssuePriceRQ","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"运价基础信息","children":[{"name":"TicketNumber_Before","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"原票号","children":[]},{"name":"IsInfant","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"是否是婴儿旅客","children":[]},{"name":"PassName","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"旅客姓名","children":[]},{"name":"InvoluntaryIdentifier","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"是否是非自愿：非自愿暂不支持","children":[]},{"name":"AirlineCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航司","children":[]},{"name":"IataCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"IATA号","children":[]},{"name":"CityCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"城市代码","children":[]},{"name":"Endorsement","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"签注信息","children":[{"name":"@RPH","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"签注信息标识","children":[]},{"name":"@PassengerRPH","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"旅客引用标识","children":[]},{"name":"@Info","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"签注信息","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"ReIssuePriceInfo","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"旅客运价","children":[{"name":"ExchangeType","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"退改类型：0：不出新票；1：出新票；","children":[]},{"name":"ExchangeFee","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"退改签费","children":[]},{"name":"ChangeFee","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"改签费","children":[]},{"name":"TicketFare","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"票面价","children":[]},{"name":"FareDiff","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"票面差价","children":[]},{"name":"TaxDiff","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"税费差价","children":[]},{"name":"TotalFare","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"总运价","children":[]},{"name":"FareComponents","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"运价信息","children":[{"name":"FareComponent","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"FareBasis","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"基础代码","children":[]}]}]}]},{"name":"TravelerRefNumber","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"旅客引用序号","children":[{"name":"@RPH","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"旅客标识，可标识旅客在PNR中的序号","children":[]},{"name":"@InfantTravelerRPH","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"婴儿ID（如果AccompaniedByInfant=true则必填）","children":[]}]}]}]},{"name":"@LimitSegmentStatusInd","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"是否限制航段状态：如果为true，则限制出票的航段状态；false，则不限制","children":[]},{"name":"@EtryInd","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"是否尝试重出票：如果为true,则失败后尝试重出票；否则不做重出票","children":[]},{"name":"@DPayPassword","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"德付通支付密码","children":[]},{"name":"@DpayIgnoreTkne","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"是否忽略含有TKNE的旅客继续出票：若为true则继续出票，否则抛出异常(由于德付通对含有TKNE项的旅客不再进行支付，所以需要用户选择是否继续这种场景的出票)","children":[]}]},{"name":"@SubscribeTicketInd","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"false","description":"是否客票订阅：默认为false","children":[]},{"name":"@SubscribeFltInd","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"false","description":"是否订阅航班动态数据：默认为false","children":[]}]}]

qaApiDemos.request:
<OTA_AirBOPReissueRQ>
    <POS>
        <Source PseudoCityCode="BJS177" OtherID="8" />
    </POS>
    <DemandTicketDetail ReconfirmSegmentInd="true" ReturnTicketInfoInd="true" LimitSegmentStatusInd="true" DPayPassword="123456">
        <AirItinerary>
            <OriginDestinationOptions>
                <OriginDestinationOption>
                    <FlightSegment RPH="1" DepartureDateTime="2019-10-10T09:30:00" ArrivalDateTime="2019-10-10T11:40:00" CodeshareInd="false" FlightNumber="1519" Status="HK" SegmentType="NORMAL">
                        <DepartureAirport LocationCode="PEK" />
                        <ArrivalAirport LocationCode="SHA" />
                        <Equipment AirEquipType="773" />
                        <MarketingAirline Code="CA" />
                        <OperatingAirline Code="CA" />
                        <BookingClassAvail ResBookDesigCode="F" />
                    </FlightSegment>
                </OriginDestinationOption>
            </OriginDestinationOptions>
        </AirItinerary>
        <BookingReferenceID ID="JEYF2F" ID_Context="PNR" />
        <PaymentInfo PaymentType="CASH" CurrencyCode="CNY">
        </PaymentInfo>
        <!-- 退改价格信息 -->
        <ReIssueInfos>
            <ReIssueInfo>
                <ReIssuePriceRQ>
                    <!-- 原票号 -->
                    <TicketNumber_Before>999-5511750073</TicketNumber_Before>
                    <IsInfant>false</IsInfant>
                    <PassName>ZHANG/JIANXIN</PassName>
                    <InvoluntaryIdentifier>false</InvoluntaryIdentifier>
                    <AirlineCode>CA</AirlineCode>
                    <IataCode>08385252</IataCode>
                    <CityCode>BJS</CityCode>
                    <Endorsement Info="不得退改签" />
                </ReIssuePriceRQ>
                <ReIssuePriceInfo>
                    <ExchangeType>1</ExchangeType>
                    <ExchangeFee>0.0</ExchangeFee>
                    <ChangeFee>0.0</ChangeFee>
                    <TicketFare>6270.00</TicketFare>
                    <FareDiff>4780.00</FareDiff>
                    <TaxDiff>0.00</TaxDiff>
                    <TotalFare>4780.00</TotalFare>
                </ReIssuePriceInfo>
            </ReIssueInfo>
            <ReIssueInfo>
                <ReIssuePriceRQ>
                    <!-- 原票号 -->
                    <TicketNumber_Before>999-5511750074</TicketNumber_Before>
                    <IsInfant>false</IsInfant>
                    <PassName>ZHANG/XIAO</PassName>
                    <InvoluntaryIdentifier>false</InvoluntaryIdentifier>
                    <AirlineCode>CA</AirlineCode>
                    <IataCode>08385252</IataCode>
                    <CityCode>BJS</CityCode>
                    <Endorsement Info="不得退改签" />
                </ReIssuePriceRQ>
                <ReIssuePriceInfo>
                    <ExchangeType>1</ExchangeType>
                    <ExchangeFee>0.0</ExchangeFee>
                    <ChangeFee>0.0</ChangeFee>
                    <TicketFare>3140.00</TicketFare>
                    <FareDiff>2390.00</FareDiff>
                    <TaxDiff>0.00</TaxDiff>
                    <TotalFare>2390.00</TotalFare>
